review: Pros: Small, well manufactured and packedCons: USB on TV cannot power on it. Thus, the size advantage is hugely discounted. Roku box isn't that big at all. I watch ESPN3 a lot and need to fast forward regularly, for instance skipping first 3 quarters of NBA and watch only the 4th quarter. Fire stick is terrible at this. Fast forward itself is extremely slow, devastatingly it cracks down ESPN3 more than 7 out of 10 and I had to start over again. I had Roku LT box and it worked like a charm in fast forwarding, no issue at all.

I have NO REGRETS with this purchase!!! Love them both!
